CLaRK_document_dtd.dtd: <!ELEMENT document (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT Documents (file*)> <!ELEMENT file EMPTY> <!ATTLIST file source CDATA #REQUIRED target CDATA #REQUIRED > <!ELEMENT folder (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT group (#PCDATA)> <!ATTLIST group recursive (y|n) #REQUIRED > <!ELEMENT info (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT inputFiles (document*|group*)> <!ELEMENT mode EMPTY> <!ATTLIST mode type (new|overwrite) "overwrite" extension CDATA #IMPLIED save (y|n) #IMPLIED overwrite (y|n) #IMPLIED > <!ELEMENT multiple (folder,output,mode,inputFiles?,outputFiles?)> <!ELEMENT output EMPTY> <!ATTLIST output type (separate|united) "separate" ufn CDATA #IMPLIED dtdname CDATA #IMPLIED > <!ELEMENT outputFiles (document*)> <!ELEMENT source (xpath,Documents?)> <!ATTLIST source NodeToNode (AllToEach|EachToEach|disable) #REQUIRED Equals (true|false|disable) #REQUIRED Operation (Copy|Move|disable) #REQUIRED IncludeSubTree (true|false|disable) #REQUIRED Xml (true|false|disable) #REQUIRED > <!ELEMENT target (xpath)> <!ATTLIST target as (0|1|2|3) #REQUIRED at CDATA #IMPLIED relative (true|false|disable) #REQUIRED > <!ELEMENT tmode (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT xpath (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT XPathTransformationquery (tmode,target,source,multiple?)> <!ATTLIST XPathTransformationquery toolName CDATA #FIXED "XPathTransformation" >
